      • registerInputClass

        public static void registerInputClass(java.lang.Class realInputClass,
                                      java.lang.Class resolverClass)
        Register new validator input class globaly
        Parameters:
        realInputClass - Java class that will be mapped to resolver class
        resolverClass - Class that implement ValidatorInputInterface

      • registerInputClassOnInstance

        public void registerInputClassOnInstance(java.lang.Class realInputClass,
                                         java.lang.Class resolverClass)
        Register new validator input class for single validator instance
        Parameters:
        realInputClass - Class of real input (JTextField, JTextArea ...)
        resolverClass - Class that will resolve validation for realInputClass (must implement ValidatorInputInterface)
